location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter reports that an English fleet (comprising of the Eagle,the Success,and the Fancy) have arrived at Muscat and that Sheik Nassir [Sheikh NƒÅsir] has renewed his demand for double rent for the English factory at Bushire. Details of a shipment of woollens for Bushire are also given.
